meanings.sent1: Her overweening attitude made others feel uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: His overweening belief in his abilities often led to mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The cat's overweening strut around the house amused the family.
meanings.sent4: The overweening sun blazed down on the beach, making everyone seek shade.
meanings.sent5: The overweening lion's roar echoed through the jungle, asserting its dominance.

meanings.sent1: The overweening size of the cake surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: She received criticism for her overweening demands during the project.
meanings.sent3: The overweening price of the toy made the children save up their allowance.
meanings.sent4: His overweening laughter filled the room, drawing attention to himself.
meanings.sent5: The overweening storm flooded the streets, causing chaos in the city.

meanings.sent1: The overweening actor refused to rehearse, thinking he was perfect.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand his overweening comments about his own intelligence.
meanings.sent3: The overweening chef claimed his dish was better than any other in the world.
meanings.sent4: His overweening behavior at the party annoyed the other guests.
meanings.sent5: The overweening politician's speech was filled with self-praise and arrogance.
